subject: Olympic Games (2016)
Swimming
lead_paragraph: The Italian Gregorio Paltrinieri, who won the 1,500 men’s freestyle at the worlds after the last-minute absence of China’s Sun Yang, could now be a favorite at the Rio Olympics.
snippet: The Italian Gregorio Paltrinieri, who won the 1,500 men’s freestyle at the worlds after the last-minute absence of China’s Sun Yang, could now be a favorite at the Rio Olympics.
